emotion_recognition.title: Emotion Recognition Game
emotion_recognition.description: Match facial expressions with the correct emotions to improve your emotional awareness.
emotion_recognition.instructions: Look at each face and select the emotion you think they are feeling. Try to get as many correct as possible!

emotion_scenarios.title: What Would You Feel?
emotion_scenarios.description: Learn about different emotional responses to everyday situations.
emotion_scenarios.instructions: Read each scenario and identify how you might feel. Then think about how others might feel in the same situation.

scenarios: Your friend doesn't invite you to their birthday party.
You get a perfect score on a difficult test.
Someone accidentally breaks your favorite toy.
You help a younger child who is lost find their parent.

saving_game.title: Savings Challenge
saving_game.description: Learn how to save money for things you want by making smart choices.
saving_game.instructions: You'll start with a virtual allowance. Make decisions about spending and saving to reach your savings goal!

budget_basics.title: Budget Basics
budget_basics.description: Learn how to create a simple budget to manage your money.
budget_basics.instructions: Follow the guided activity to create your first budget. Decide how much to save, spend, and share.

storytelling.title: Creative Storytelling
storytelling.description: Develop your speaking skills by creating and sharing stories.
storytelling.instructions: Use the story prompts to create your own short story. Practice telling it clearly and with expression.

prompts: A lost puppy finds a magical friend
An adventure in a mysterious forest
Finding a secret message in a library book
Making friends with someone from another country

active_listening.title: Active Listening Skills
active_listening.description: Learn how to be a great listener and why it matters.
active_listening.instructions: Watch the short video about active listening, then practice with the listening challenge.

home_safety.title: Home Safety Explorer
home_safety.description: Learn to identify and prevent common safety hazards at home.
home_safety.instructions: Explore the virtual house and spot potential safety hazards. Tap on each hazard to learn how to make it safe.

emergency_calls.title: Emergency Call Practice
emergency_calls.description: Learn when and how to call for help in an emergency.
emergency_calls.instructions: Practice what to say when calling emergency services. Remember to stay calm and provide clear information.

recycling_sort.title: Recycling Sorter
recycling_sort.description: Learn which items can be recycled and how to sort them correctly.
recycling_sort.instructions: Sort the different items into the correct bins: recycling, compost, or trash.

water_conservation.title: Water Saver Challenge
water_conservation.description: Discover ways to save water and why it's important for our planet.
water_conservation.instructions: Complete the interactive quiz to learn about water conservation. Then create your own water-saving plan.

yoga_basics.title: Kid's Yoga Basics
yoga_basics.description: Learn simple yoga poses that improve strength, balance, and flexibility.
yoga_basics.instructions: Follow along with the animated demonstrations to try each yoga pose. Hold each pose for 10-15 seconds.

dance_party.title: Dance Party Workout
dance_party.description: Get moving with fun dance moves that improve coordination and fitness.
dance_party.instructions: Follow the animated dance moves on screen. Try to keep up and have fun moving to the beat!
